name: No Time to EGGsplain
description:
Description : 

In this game you control a wooden cart which aim is to safely transport an egg to the finish line. Be careful, because the egg will break if you drop it to the ground!

This game is an entry for the Ludum Dare 46 in the Jam category (72h to make a game), the theme of this edition was Keep it alive.

Keys: 

A-D (or left and right arrows) : Move the cart while on the ground or rotate it while on the air.
R : Restart current level.
Escape : Go back to the main menu.
